title: Bug SPlat when Trying to load into a game
body: Why dio i keep getting bug splat. It wont let me even load into the game and im afraid of being reported and banned

replies.body: GOT THE SAME PROBLEME CAN SOMEONE HELP US

There might be some bad game files or driver issues that's causing you to bugsplat and crash out of game.  I suggest going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to help tune up your game and make sure everything is setup correctly.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have this same problem as well and I've done everything on the support gamesplat fix list and still nothing. This didn't happen for me until I updated to 6.19. I can't even do custom games without it popping up with gamesplat. 
To make sure I have done the following :
1. checked minimum requirement
2. updated graphics drivers, DirectX, windows (were all up-to-date)
3. reinstalled .net framework 3.5 
4. repaired game files
5. performed a clean boot
6. reset my graphics card software
7. (can't change game settings if i can't enter the game can I?)
8. Disabled debug version of directX
9. Also have reinstalled the game 4 times.

now if theres something else you can think of I'd love to hear. Cause I'm out of options.

I followed the same steps and I still can't load into bot games or regular games. It bugsplats after champion select every time. Very frustrating. After a windows update last night I haven't been able to log in, but all of the settings seem to be the same as before. Please help, thanks!

I installed LoL and it still doesn't work. Does it have something to do with it being windows 10?
